thread.title: Lions claim OT Michael Ola off waivers from Chargers
thread.title_full: Lions claim OT Michael Ola off waivers from Chargers

author: The Associated Press
title: Lions claim OT Michael Ola off waivers from Chargers
text: Lions claim OT Michael Ola off waivers from Chargers The Detroit Lions have claimed offensive tackle Michael Ola off waivers from the San Diego Chargers and released guard Taylor Boggs. Comment Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 3:55 PM By The Associated Press Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 3:55 PM ALLEN PARK, Mich. (AP) â€” The Detroit Lions have claimed offensive tackle Michael Ola off waivers from the San Diego Chargers and released guard Taylor Boggs. Detroit, coming off its first win of the year, made the moves Wednesday as it prepared to play the Minnesota Vikings. The 6-foot-4, 312-pound Ola played in two games for the Chargers and started 12 last year for the Chicago Bears. Boggs played in two games this year. He played in a total of five games the previous two seasons for the Bears. ___ AP NFL websites: http://www.pro32.ap.org and http://www.twitter.com/AP_NFL By The Associated Press
